content:
BreakLineStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies line styles for axis scale breaks.

In this Article

public enum BreakLineStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
BreakLineStyle

Fields

None

Scale break is not displayed.
Ragged

Scale break is displayed as a ragged line.
Straight

Scale break is displayed as a straight line.
Wave

Scale break is displayed as a wavy line.
